StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateBarronsPro.le]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SchoolID int, @FiscalYear int, @BarronsIndex varchar(5), @LastEditBy varchar(50) )
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] WHERE SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolID AND FiscalYear = @FiscalYear) BEGIN UPDATE [USMC].[CollegePro.le] SET [BarronsIndex] = @BarronsIndex, [UserLogin] = @LastEditBy, [UpdateDate] = getdate() WHERE SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolID AND FiscalYear = @FiscalYear END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [USMC].[CollegePro.le] ( [CollegePro.leID], [SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear], [BarronsIndex], [PriorityCode], [UserLogin], [UpdateDate] ) VALUES ( newid(), @SchoolID, @FiscalYear, @BarronsIndex, 1, @LastEditBy, getdate() ) END
